creator: mikelbruder@aol.com
text:
Created attachment 23176
screenshot of the error messge

After starting thew http Server, I receive the following error message:

"httpd.exe: Could not reliably determine the server's fully qualified domaine name, using 192.168.178.23 for serverName
<OS 10048>Normalerweise darf jede Socketadresse <Protokoll, Netzwerkadresse oder Anschluss> nur jeweils einmal verwendet werden.  : make_sock: could not bind to address 0.0.0.0:80
no listening sockets available, shutting down
Unale to open logs..."

I have tried with "Listen 0.0.0.0:81" ; "Listen 0.0.0.0:82" ; "Listen 0.0.0.0:81"

I have tried with "Listen 81" ; "Listen 82" ; "Listen 83"

The error message remains the same for each of the above listen entries.

Thanks in advance for help
Michael

Entries in the httpd-Editor:

"User daemon
Group daemon

ServerAdmin michaelbruder@mikel24fps.com

ServerName www.mikel24fps.com: 80"

creator: poirier@pobox.com
text: Bugzilla is for reporting bugs, not user support.  See http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users
